name: Towers&Attackers
description:
*The Robots are taking over!*

As the last of humanity, you must defend yourself from the hordes of robots. However, you know you can't last forever, for a total victory, you must also prepare your forces and march up the path to destroy the factories creating these death machines.  Watch out! The Robots will attempt to turn your defenses against you in an attempt to stop your forces.

*In-Game Statistics:*

*Player and enemy have equal equivalents
